page.title: 05A typical working day.
page.content:
I live in Bloxwich and I work for a parcel carriers firm from 10 a.m. to 8.00 p.m.I load my lorry to deliver parcels to Birmingham,a busy city with lots of traffic and parking problems. Then I make fourteen collections from warehouses and factories.I return to the depot in Walsall Wood,unload and sort parcels into trailers which travel overnight to destinations all over Britain.
I live in Bloxwich and have worked as a hod carrier for a local building firm for seven years.I work a 42 hour week.I mix "compo"(mortar),climb a ladder and tip it onto a board for the brick layers.The job is very tiring and rather tedious at times.
